title: [BUG] SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux.NoDependencies is adding a reference to osx binary which does not exist
body:
**Description**

We get the following warning in visual studio for our winforms project:
> Warning		The referenced component 'C:\Users\xPaw\.nuget\packages\skiasharp.nativeassets.linux.nodependencies\1.68.1.1\buildTransitive\net45\\..\\..\\runtimes\osx\native\libSkiaSharp.dylib' could not be found.	GUI			

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  <!-- the version of SkiaSharp that has the issue --> 1.68.1.1
- IDE:  <!-- Visual Studio / Visual Studio for Mac / MonoDevelop / Visual Studio Code --> VS 2019
- Platform Target Frameworks: <!-- all that apply, remove the platforms that aren't broken or haven't had any testing --> .net 4.7.2
- Target Devices:  Windows

**Screenshots**

<!-- if the issue is a visual issue, please include screenshots showing the problem if possible -->

**Reproduction Link**

<!-- please upload or provide a link to a reproduction case -->
Project: https://github.com/SteamDatabase/ValveResourceFormat

ValveResourceFormat.csproj (net core) references skia like this:
```
    <PackageReference Include="SkiaSharp" Version="1.68.1.1" />
    <PackageReference Include="SkiaSharp.NativeAssets.Linux.NoDependencies" Version="1.68.1.1" />
```

and the GUI (winforms) references the csproj above.
